COMPANY DESCRIPTION Founded in Singapore in 2004, Akribis Systems is a motion control company that provides high precision direct drive motors. We construct products for a range of industries including renewable energy, semiconductor, communication, biomedical, robotics or any industry that requires precise motion. We produce direct drive motors with a high force density and patented coil design that decreases cogging. Our linear and rotary motors also are available with stages that we manufacture ourselves so you can smoothly integrate the motor into your design. More than simply a manufacturer, we are also innovators. Our deep knowledge of engineering and dedication to the work has resulted in 44 patents, and our research and development into the field of magnetics will only continue to grow our business. Our engineers are able to custom design motors and stages to your specific requirements with you as a co-developer. Function Overview: Citi’s Treasury and Trade Solutions group is built on the power of our network. Citi Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS), provides integrated cash management and trade finance services to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations across the globe. With a full range of digital and mobile enabled platforms, tools and analytics, TTS continues to lead the way in delivering innovative and tailored solutions to its clients. TTS offers the industry’s most comprehensive suite of treasury and trade solutions including cash management, payments, receivables, liquidity management and investment services, working capital solutions, commercial card programs, trade finance and services. TTS counts 80% of Global Fortune 500, over 1,100 public sector entities and thousands of financial institutions amongst its diverse client base Doing business In 160 countries and jurisdictions, and transacting in over 140 currencies, TTS processes some USD 4.0 trillion of client payments everyday Collaborates with clients to deliver next-generation financial solutions using TTS Innovation Labs Application / Team Overview: Citibank® Commercial Cards offers card-based payment solutions to large corporations and federal and state governments for the procurement of goods and services as well as travel, entertainment, and fleet related expenses. Commercial Cards' strategic objective is to compete and differentiate on the basis of global capability and customized solutions for high-value customers. Role Description: We are seeking for an Technical Delivery Manager for Commercial Card’s Tech Delivery team. The successful candidate will interact with planning, business analysis, development, testing, and production support teams, as well as other departments within Citigroup (such as the System Administrators, Database Administrators, Data Centre Operations, and Change Control groups) for TTS commercial cards VisionPlus platform and surrounding eco system delivery. He/she requires exceptional communication skills across both technology and the business and will have a high degree of visibility. The candidate will be a rigorous technical project management lead with a strong understanding of how to manage and deliver scalable, enterprise level global applications. The candidate will handle requests/queries related to Commercial Card Technology. Support financials and project management activities. Assume administrator responsibilities of some applications. Manage Regulatory, Technology and Strategic Business projects/releases right from initiation following complete project lifecycle covering all stages including development, SIT, UAT, project implementation and PVT – Production Verification Testing Support. Detail Role Specifications & Requirements Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 15+ years of experience working on projects as a Technical Project / Delivery Manager / Scrum Master delivering multiple projects across Mainframe and Middleware channels in Payments / Credit Cards domain. Project management, interpersonal, and communication skills, with high attention to minute details. Working experience with Vision Plus Application and surround system delivery PMP certification, Agile certification & experience will be an added advantage Technical / Functional Proficiency: Advanced knowledge and experience of SDLC. Assume role in IT Project Management Tools (E.g. PTS-W/Planview) to create projects, manage updates and governance process of these tools for projects being managed. Ensure that projects are allocated to the project team and monitor the clocking of time by different teams working on the project throughout the life cycle of the project. Provide progress and overall project status, including risk management plans, issue resolution approach, and overall actions and decisions needed by the stakeholders Own and lead application related changes, risk and compliance coordination by appropriately prioritizing the required work effort. Advise and assist application teams on issue remediation / corrective action plan, compensating control, and risk exception alternatives where IT risk requirements cannot be met Support reporting activities associated within key risk, control, governance, and compliance functions. Work with onsite development partners to participate in design and architecture for key enterprise applications to ensure deliver software on time, to required standards and as per the design documentation. Proactively notify Development Project Manager of risks, bottlenecks, problems, issues, and concerns. Compliance with Citi's System Development Lifecycle and Information Security requirements. Will work closely with Quality Control teams to deliver quality software to agreed project schedules. Advanced knowledge and experience of SDLC. Leadership Skills: A good understanding of the credit card industry, Infrastructure across Mainframe, Middleware and Front End Channels. Requires Strong Stakeholder Management experience to drive discussions between Business, Solutions, Operations and Application Teams. Ability to build a comprehensive understanding of project stakeholders, subject matter, and priorities Leadership and strong communication skills Flexible to work across different Time zones supporting stakeholders across LATAM, EMEA and ASPAC regions. Strong customer service focuses with the ability to communicate with highly technical management teams. Possess excellent verbal and written communication skills, both technical and functional. Demonstrate excellent leadership, interpersonal, and team building skills. Managing time and changing priorities in a dynamic environment Ability to provide quick turnaround to software issues and management requests Ability to assimilate key issues and concepts and come up to speed quickly

1. Salesforce Support The sales support team carries out a number of functions to help sales representatives do their job more effectively. They contact customers and prospects to arrange appointments and when necessary, attend customer meetings in support of sales representatives. Sales Support team also keeps customers updated on status of orders or delivery. They provide sales representatives with details of customers’ orders and requests for quotations, and update relevant parties on any issues that may affect customer relationships. Follow up with customers after issuing of quotations or follow up on customer demand of regular items. They handle telephone calls and acknowledge customers’ e-mails or letters for representatives who are away from the office. Sales support teams may also arrange travel or accommodation for sales representatives and process their claims for business expenses. 2. Sales Order Administration Sales administration is an important responsibility of the sales support team, it includes handling of customer enquiries, quotations, accepting Orders, processing orders, managing of vendors, arranging deliveries, fulfilling customer orders and invoicing. Incoming orders from sales representatives maybe received via mail, telephone, e-mail online ordering and in the form of Letter of Credits. Enter details of the order on the company’s ERP system and check that it includes the correct price, discount level and product requirements etc. They check stock availability or production schedules and forward the order details to production and distribution departments. They send an acknowledgment to the customer and email or phone with updates on order fulfillment and delivery. 3. Records Sales support teams create and maintain customer records, updating details when contacts change or when customers request quotations or place orders. They also log any customer problems or complaints on the record so that sales representatives and managers have a complete picture of the customers’ interactions with the company. 4. Others · Assists the sales team, focusing mostly on managing schedules and the distribution of any sales documentation. · Prepares and then follows up on any sales quotations made for clients, negotiating terms with the client at a cost best suited for them. · Be able to efficiently respond to all in-coming sales enquiries; by fax, email, any online or telephone queries in a calm and friendly manner. · Must liaise between other departments and the client to provide the service most suitable to the client’s needs, cost and time restraints. · Be able to work closely with the Sales team to assess the progress of the department and develop Sales strategy accordingly. · Preparing brochures for client as required. · Ensure an efficient tracking system of all event paper-work · Any other Ad-hoc tasks . Team Lead to Sales Admin section/ team to lead and assist the manager to manage a group of 3 sales administrator

Full management responsibility of a team or multiple teams, including management of people, budget and planning, to include performance evaluation, compensation, hiring, disciplinary actions and terminations and budget approval. Responsibilities: Demonstrate the ability to attract senior talent and multiple functions from inside and outside of company. Teach others how to set high organizational performance standards, determine performance measures and goals and establish a leadership bar. This will require the ability to facilitate understanding of broader organizational tenets and strategic goals for department Recognize trends for larger-scale development needs within and across teams and builds plans to develop skills. Share talent development best practices across organization Audit department goals to ensure alignment with broader organizational goals and that these goals are aligned with and accountable for department performance against goals Develop and communicate department vision that supports the broader organizational vision; ensure team culture consistently demonstrates alignment with leadership principles; and visibly ties department decisions to leadership principles and tenets Lead the development, implementation, and delivery of successful large-scale, critical and/or difficult software efforts involving significant work (can be new software or a refactor of existing software). Heavily influence the development and write a significant portion of the “critical-path” code. Think in terms of architecture, not just code. Have detailed knowledge of the work done by your team and proactively work to improve consistency and integration between your software and related software (owned by other teams). Influence your team’s technical and business strategy by making insightful contributions to team priorities and approach. You take the lead in identifying and solving ambiguous problems, architecture deficiencies, or areas where your team’s software bottlenecks the innovation of other teams. Make software simpler. Able to communicate your ideas effectively to achieve the right outcome for your team and customer. Harmonize discordant views and lead the resolution of contentious issues (build consensus). Lead design reviews for your team and actively participate in design reviews of related software or other team software at your location. Code, development and implementation decisions set a great example to others. Provide insightful code reviews and take ownership of outcome. Description: Person in this role has the responsibility to collect vibration and temperature measurement data from equipment at plant site(s). He/She shall provide reliable data to enable the Analyst to diagnose and troubleshoot issues and provide recommendations to the customers. This Person shall be trained to become certified to repair, calibrate and configure portable devices. He/She shall provide technical support to our customers in Asia Pacific (AP), including diagnosing and troubleshooting issues with the devices. He/She will be required to prepare and facilitate shipment/courier of devices to transfer them back to their owners in the respective countries. Job Responsibilities: Collects vibration and Temperature measurement data at site using portable instruments as per client’s schedule. Reports site observations & findings to Engineer. Full compliance to site safety requirements. Strictly follows all site procedures including but not limited to application of work permit. Carries out repair, calibration and configuration of field portable devices used for instrument health checks and vibration monitoring. Provides technical support and offer recommendations to customer for technical related issues. Provides assessment of repair and/or upgrade works required and prepare quotations to customers. Conducts basic administrative duties such as maintenance of engineering records and generation of standard service reports. Assists co-workers where required or assigned by supervisors. Job Requirements: ITE/Diploma in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering, preferably with 2 years of working experience. Understanding of mechanical or instrumental equipment is required. Candidate with knowledge on Vibration measurement and/or has Vibration ISO Level 1 Certification is preferred. Candidate shall have good analytical & troubleshooting skills, preferably be self-motivated and willing to learn. Experience with Emerson CSI 2130/ CSI 2140 portable instruments will be an advantage. Effective verbal communication and good writing skills. Candidates with plant exposure and/or vibration monitoring knowledge has advantage.

Job_Descriptions: Job Description The Singapore Academy of Law (“SAL”) is a promotion and development agency for Singapore’s legal industry. Our vision is to make Singapore the legal hub of Asia. The Singapore Mediation Centre (“SMC”) is a subsidiary of the Academy. Established in 1997, SMC pioneered the use of mediation as the mainstream mechanism for dispute resolution, as well as training in negotiation and conflict management. Today, SMC offers a suite of alternative dispute resolution services which brings clarity and objectivity to complex situations. These services include mediation, adjudication, neutral evaluation and domain name dispute resolution. Through our panel of professional mediators with legal and industry expertise, SMC is well-placed to manage difficult negotiations and unlock standstills for businesses by providing cost-effective and timely solutions. At SMC, our vision is to help all businesses fully appreciate the value of mediation as a strategic risk-management tool that they can count on in commercial dealings. Responsibilities: You will support the administration of cases by managing the financial aspects of case files that are administered by SMC’s Registry team. This includes, but not limited to, SMC’s core services for Mediation and Adjudication. You will require familiarity with using SMC’s inhouse enterprise resource planning software – Business Central – to create customer cards, input data and generate invoicing (including e-invoicing) for case files. You will be required to liaise closely with the Finance department on invoicing, receipts, and other financial aspects between SMC’s Registry team and the Finance department. You may also be required to undertake other ad hoc duties in relation to the financial aspects of case files as and when required (e.g. collection and dispatch of cheques/documents). Requirements: Have familiarity with Business Central and MS Office. Be meticulous and organized, possess initiative, and are able to multitask to meet deadlines. Preferably have work experience related to Finance and/or Accounting. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Those who submit vulnerabilities with good grades on major security platforms are preferred. 7. Have a certain level of programming foundation, such as: Python, Java, etc.

Job_Title: AVP/ VP, Fixed Income Financing Portfolio Manager
Job_Descriptions: The Portfolio Execution Group (PEG) is responsible for trade execution, funding and liquidity management, securities financing, portfolio rebalancing, and beta replication. These functions are carried out by 4 groups – Balance Sheet Management Group (BMG), Beta and Asset Rebalancing (BAR), Global Trading Unit (GTU) and Applied Research Unit (ARU). BMG manages GIC’s centralized liquidity pool and the Total Portfolio’s funding and currency hedging requirements. The team also manages a securities financing portfolio to extract outperformance from available inventory. BMG is seeking a suitable candidate to join us based in Singapore . Relocation to an overseas GIC office (New York or London) may be considered after a suitable period in Singapore, contingent on business needs. Responsibilities Manage GIC’s Total Portfolio liquidity and fixed income financing activities in physical format and synthetic structures, with the remit to engage in cross-asset financing opportunities and inventory optimization. Contribute towards building the infrastructure and framework to optimize the value of GIC’s balance sheet and firm resources, price risk/reward and minimize collateral costs from a holistic, cross-asset perspective. Generate ideas and implement strategies to deliver value-add from BMG’s liquidity portfolio and cross-asset financing activities across global markets. Drive the development of systems and technological capabilities to elevate BMG’s data quotient and enhance efficiency and scalability of BMG’s business. Liaise with external parties including agent lenders, banks and other buy-side investors to execute trading strategies and expand financing relationships. Keep abreast of industry and regulatory developments in financing and money markets to provide insights and thought leadership for GIC. Collaborate with colleagues within PEG and the broader GIC to grow BMG’s business capabilities and deploy balance sheet optimally. Required Experience and Attributes 5 – 10 years of relevant experience in financing and money markets. Experience with managing funding programs and/or financing portfolios is desirable. In-depth understanding of fixed income financing and money market drivers and dynamics. Able to formulate trading strategies using cash and derivative instruments to monetize funding market opportunities. Experience in cross-asset financing and cross-currency markets would be a plus. Familiar with optimization concepts and techniques and its application in financing, liquidity placement and collateral management decisions. Programming and quantitative skills would be an advantage. Understands the interaction of fixed income financing activity with active portfolio management requirements; has an appreciation of the front-mid-back trade cycle and workflows involved in fixed income financing activity. Knowledge of financial regulations and their impact on banks’ financing and capital/balance sheet management activities. Self-driven, attentive to details and team oriented. Able to work within an institutional setup and across different teams to deliver results. Clear and effective written and verbal communication skills. Please apply directly to the following link if you are interested in the role above: https://careers.gic.com.sg/job-invite/10347/

The area: Engineering & Operations Google is an engineering company at heart. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on users around the world. At Google, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, social to local, Google engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another. The role: Software Engineer, Google Pay - Singapore Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. Job_Descriptions: Job Description We are looking to host solution-minded student to embark their internship journey with us. Here’s your chance to create a journey with us. Come join our medical start-up. EndoSiq Technology Pte Ltd is a medical start-up developing an advanced machine vision tracking system for the management of Overactive Bladder (OAB). Our goal is to design and develop a proprietary diagnostic tool to analyze real-time images of the bladder. The diagnostic tool will help pinpoint unusual muscle group activity to help in the treatment of OAB. We need passionate and flexible engineers to grow with us. EndoSiq Technology Pte Ltd is incubated by Trendlines Medical Singapore Pte Ltd. Project Name: Deep-Learning architecture development involving 2D and 1D vascular datasets such as specklegram / photoplethysmogram biosignals for polymorphic determination in cardiometabolic diseases Background: Worldwide, a third of adults suffer from some form of Cardiovascular disease (CVD) which annually contribute to the deaths of 17.7 million people globally, accounting for 31% of total deaths. In comparison, the combined annual deaths resulting from HIV/Aids, malaria, and tuberculosis combined only amount to 3.86 million. Hypertension affects at least 25% of the global adult population and is the most common cause of CVD-related deaths due to associated secondary pathologies. There is also a significant association of hypertension with type 2 diabetes mellitus (DM) with hypertension being twice as frequent in diabetic sufferers compared to non-diabetics. By 2050, Singapore projects that there will be 1 million sufferers of diabetes, accounting for 10% of the disease burden in Singapore. Disease prediction solely from genotyping has resulted in poor associations due to unexpected multi-nomic interactions. Scope: This project proposal seeks to apply advanced Machine Learning (ML) or Deep Learning (DL) algorithms on 1D/2D datasets to identify potential pleiotropic relationships in cardiometabolic diseases. We will also evaluate the predictive performance and accuracy of various AI-ML algorithms. The objective is to develop an advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) architecture extracting critical features from the pulsatile morphology of 1-Dimensional PPG signals or 2D vascular videos to form an adaptive numerical model of an individual. Due difficulty in acquiring real-world biosignal datasets, novel techniques will need to be implemented to address the limited data available for training such as autonomous semi-supervised neural network designs. The project will involve 1D/2D signal processing and deep learning and will require strong knowledge in Python programming. Application Deadline: 1 May 2022 Fast Apply No CV Required Fast Interview via Chat Report Job Share this job with your friends
